document_data.name: Horel
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20220221195407/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_1112-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Nov – Dec 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Horel''' was a [[drug]] and [[poison]] created by distilling a freshwater lily pad plant called [[halfling's hand]], also known as oxhrel, and mixing it in a certain secret proportion with powdered [[horseradish]].
document_data.Powers: The resulting substance was a green liquid, harmless to skin contact or ingestion. However, if a needle or a weapon was coated with horel and the substance entered the bloodstream, the victim started violently convulsing, which dramatically affected their ability to defend oneself in battle or perform a simple task requiring a steady hand.
